mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.`rdcid`, d.`deviceid` , t.`coldstorageid`, c.`name` , c.`startTemperature`, c.`tempdiff` FROM `smartcold`.`tempset` t LEFT JOIN `smartcold`.`coldstorageset` c on t.`coldstorageid`= c.`id` LEFT JOIN `sc360`.`deviceobjectmapping` d on d.`oid` =t.id and d.`type` =18 where `startTemperature`!= 0 AND `tempdiff`!=0 ;
